official_title: A Colorectal Cancer Educational Intervention in the Latino Community Assessing the Feasibility of Recruitment & Retention Via a Church-Based Approach: Identification of Novel Barriers to Cancer Clinical Trial Enrollment
inclusion_criteria:
* Spanish speaking
* Identifying as Latino
* 18 years or older
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Non-Spanish speakers
* Not identifying as Latino
* Younger than 18 years old
